backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with story, draft, user profile, and comment/report types, plus story comparison and distance-calculation utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that adds optional locationName fields to stories and drafts by transforming old stored data into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root element and loads the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, routing between views, runtime UI interactivity guard, and profile-setup logic.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: A dialog component for creating or editing stories with fields for content, category, location, anonymity, images, and draft management.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryFAB.t: A floating action button that triggers story creation when clicked.
frontend/src/components/DistanceKmSlider: A range slider for selecting a distance in kilometers with optional helper text and inactive mode.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: A category filter bar allowing users to select or clear story category filters.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A top navigation bar with branding, theme toggle, auth controls, and links to profile, admin, and local updates.
frontend/src/components/local-updates/Cr: Dialog for creating and submitting a local update with category, radius, text, and optional image.
frontend/src/components/local-updates/Lo: Displays full details of a local update with view tracking, thumbs-up, and optional deletion.
A dialog allowing users to mute or unmute local update categories using switches and visual icons.
A floating action button that triggers creation of a new local update.
Displays a list of local updates with relevance info, thumbnails, metadata, and thumbs‑up interactions.
Renders a Leaflet-powered map showing update markers, user location, and selectable update details.
frontend/src/components/LocationPickerDi: A dialog for selecting a geographic location via map interaction or geolocation fallback.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: A Leaflet-based map showing story markers, user location, search, clustering, and selectable coordinates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal prompting new users to choose and save a username before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/SortControl.tsx: A dropdown control letting users select sorting options such as newest, nearest, or most viewed.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with image, distance, and interactive like, pin, comment, and share actions.
frontend/src/components/StoryDetailDialo: Shows a detailed view of a story including likes, pins, comments, reporting, editing, and deletion options.
frontend/src/components/StoryFeed.tsx: Renders a grid of StoryCard components with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/WallpaperSetting: Provides a dialog for selecting, previewing, applying, or removing a custom wallpaper image.
frontend/src/env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables used in the frontend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDrafts.ts: React hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating story drafts through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useForegroundLocation: Provides foreground geolocation tracking with watchPosition and polling fallbacks, exposing location and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocationPermiss: Provides a hook to manage geolocation permissions, track location state, handle errors, and request updates with diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login flow, stored identities, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeafletMapResize.t: Auto-invalidates Leaflet map size when its container becomes visible or resizes using ResizeObserver and timed adjustments.
Manages muted local update categories with localStorage persistence and helpers to toggle or check mute status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalUpdateNotific: Shows system or toast notifications for nearby local updates based on relevance, user location, and mute settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalUpdates.ts: Provides React Query hooks to create and fetch local updates, including proximity and category filters, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, stories, and other backend data with identity-aware loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useReverseGeocodedPla: React hook that reverse‑geocodes coordinates and tracks loading, result, and errors with abort support.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaper.ts: Manages wallpaper state with localStorage persistence, allowing applying and removing image files as data URLs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for themes and layout, including dialog and app container rules.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Provides label and color mappings for story categories.
frontend/src/lib/distanceFilterDebug.ts: Debug utilities for logging distance‑based filtering decisions, toggleable via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/env.ts: Typed helpers for reading Vite environment variables with optional fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/leafletLoader.ts: Reference‑counted loader for Leaflet and MarkerCluster scripts and styles to prevent premature unloading.
frontend/src/lib/localUpdates.ts: Category metadata, distance checks, and relevance calculations for local updates.
frontend/src/lib/locationFilter.ts: Determines whether a story falls within a given radius, with optional debug logging.
Static UI copy for various location permission states with a helper to retrieve text.
frontend/src/lib/reverseGeocode.ts: Provides reverse geocoding via Nominatim with caching and fallback handling, returning concise place names.
frontend/src/lib/startupValidation.ts: Checks and logs configuration values like Internet Identity URL without blocking startup.
frontend/src/lib/storySorting.ts: Implements multiple story-sorting modes and maps frontend sort options to backend equivalents.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains class name merging, Haversine distance calculation, and distance formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/wallpaperValidation.ts: Validates wallpaper file size and MIME type and exposes helper labels for limits and formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminModerationPage.t: Admin dashboard to review, view, dismiss, and delete reported stories with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed and map view handling story browsing, creation, sorting, distance filtering, and geolocation state.
frontend/src/pages/LocalUpdatesPage.tsx: Displays nearby local updates with location tracking, muting, notifications, and list/map views.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React profile page that loads posted, liked, and pinned stories and displays them in tabbed grids with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and modifying hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing existing features, new feature requests, and versioning for the location name field work.
